    async def parse(self, groups: Optional[MessageChain]) -> Optional[MessageChain]:

      api_base: https://api.deepseek.com/v1
      api_key: xxx
    enable: true
    models:
    - deepseek-chat
    - deepseek-reasoner
defaults:
  llm_model: gemini-1.5-flash
memory:
  persistence:
    type: file
    file:
      storage_dir: ./data/memory
    redis:
      host: localhost
      port: 6379
      db: 0
  max_entries: 100
  default_scope: member
web:
  host: 0.0.0.0
  port: 80
  secret_key: ''
  password_file: ./data/web/password.hash
plugins:
  enable: []
  market_base_url: https://kirara-plugin.app.lss233.com/api/v1
update:
  pypi_registry: https://pypi.org/simple
  npm_registry: https://registry.npmjs.org
frpc:
  enable: false
  server_addr: ''
  server_port: 7000
  token: ''
  remote_port: 0
system:
  timezone: Asia/Shanghai

```
